citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A 6-year-old female maltese named Sophie (microchip #956000010239841) was observed to have a moderate to severe
amount of dental tartar buildup and a mobile upper right pre-molar.
Dental issues can be painful to the animal and if left untreated can result in systemic issues and even death.
Appropriate dental care must be provided to each animal. The attending veterinarian must be contacted and the dog
should be treated per his/her instructions.
To be corrected by 6/25/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors:
Marla Renshaw, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A 6-year-old female maltese named Sophie (microchip #956000010239841) was observed to have a moderate to severe 
amount of dental tartar buildup and a mobile upper right pre-molar.  
Dental issues can be painful to the animal and if left untreated can result in systemic issues and even death.  
Appropriate dental care must be provided to each animal. The attending veterinarian must be contacted and the dog 
should be treated per his/her instructions.  
To be corrected by 6/25/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.  
 
End of report. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Marla Renshaw, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n
